dashboard.client-description: A robust tool for API testing and development.
dashboard.history-description: View and manage the history of your executed API requests, including methods, URLs, and dates.
dashboard.variables-description: Define and manage key-value pairs for dynamic request customization. Simplify your API testing by reusing variables in multiple requests with ease.
